name: Invadoors
description:
When one doors closes, it means you are probably dead

Head for the ones that are open

How To Play

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move. Space to shoot.
  • Fly up or to the sides and loop around the screen.
  • You cannot go backwards, going forwards and looping is your only option
  • Shoot enemies to unlock them and make them vulnerable.
  • While vulnerable, fly through them to destroy them.
  • Destroying locks will unlock the next tier of enemies.
  • Destroying enough new enemies and a new lock will appear.

Credits:

  • Music - 8Bit Music Album by GWriterStudio
